pr_title: Handle unexpected (old or weird) OSes that may not support our directory detection.

timeline.message:
PathManager.java: Added user prompt on failure due to error in windowsXP. Giving the user a second chance to run the game.
Added a headless server condition to set the homepath as current directory.

timeline.author: SoniEx2
SoniEx2

timeline.bodyText: Should/can this be part of useDefaultHomePath?
timeline.author: skaldarnar

replies.bodyText: It could be but then it would have to catch the exception inside the useDefaultHomePath, moreover this provides a much modular approach and a generic solution to all further weird OSeS
replies.author: sladyn98

timeline.bodyText: If this can recover any exception that was thrown before, there is no need to reportException before trying the backup. At least, it should not be reported as an error (maybe as a warning, or probably just on INFO level).
timeline.author: skaldarnar

replies.bodyText: Yeah , you have a valid point I just thought that it would be good to report an exception without stopping execution. A Warning sounds like a much better approach  :)
replies.author: sladyn98
